name: Yours to Match
description:
Hello everyone!

This minigame is inspired on the characters Cain and Jooin from the BL manhwa "Yours to Claim", created by Waje and ZzimBam 

Both characters were born on October 10th, and "Yours to Match" is brought to you as one of the activities to celebrate their Birthday! We hope you enjoy it.

PLEASE READ THE INSTRUCTIONS BELOW

Support the authors in Lezhin: 

KO: https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/jooin

EN:  www.lezhinus.com/en/comic/yourstoclaim

JP :https://www.lezhin.jp/ja/comic/juin

ES: https://www.lezhin.es/detail/LZ_3100007

Did you want the pictures of this game? 

Look the ZIP below, and enjoy new icons for your favorite social media!
